section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: The provisions of this act which amend article 9 and the provisions affecting secured transactions shall become effective at 12:01 A.M. on the 181st day after the effective date of this act.

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.annotation: “This act”, referred to in this section, is D.C. Law 4-85.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 4-85 became law on March 16, 1982. The 181st day following March 16, 1982 was September 13, 1982.
